goals__remit: Operation as a network of partners and working as an open university system with flexible and pragmatic programmes in European public affairs, following a practice-oriented training concept with modular structure in order to tailor projects for NGOs, institutions, enterprises and individuals from especially within the EU, Candidate and Neighbourhood countries - especially for young people, economists, lawyers and journalists.
